Class AbstractTool

java.lang.Object
  org.stuntaz.qcwtool.tools.AbstractTool
Direct Known Subclasses:
MergeTool, ReplaceTool, VerifyTool
public abstract class AbstractTool
extends java.lang.Object

Defines the interface for a QCWTool sub-tool.
